channel.title: Juggle Fashion Action Matiss Irc on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: #corporate
item.description: heh. so this irc channel has totally made for fun times. I hooked up this to log everything and especially links.. hehe. it rules. but whatever. the only problem is that it doens’t log the bot - which will be annoying.. especially when we play trivia.. which you are all invited to participate in. btw.. trivia rules.this weekend.. was dope. we hung out in wicker park for this crazy block party.
